Package javax.faces.event

Class PostValidateEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • javax.faces.event.SystemEvent
        • javax.faces.event.ComponentSystemEvent
          • javax.faces.event.PostValidateEvent

  • public class PostValidateEvent
extends ComponentSystemEvent

    When an instance of this event is passed to SystemEventListener.processEvent(javax.faces.event.SystemEvent) or ComponentSystemEventListener.processEvent(javax.faces.event.ComponentSystemEvent), the listener implementation may assume that the source of this event instance is the UIComponent instance that is that has just been validated.

    Components with children must publish this event after processing their child nodes in UIComponent.processValidators(javax.faces.context.FacesContext). This is especially important for iterating components such as UIData, and form components, such as UIForm.

    Since:
    2.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
